data.title: Great, authentic middle eastern food, friendly owners
data.text: We went to Mezzah today and enjoyed very good and authentic middle eastern food in an extremely nice environment with very friendly owners. The mixed mezzah plate was extremely tasty, freshly prepared, nicely presented and served with fresh, still hot original pita bread (not a tortilla as falsely stated by another user). It has a very nice interior but also nice patio located directly at the El Cajon main square. Will go there again and definitely recommend it!

data.title: A falafel should not be served in a tortilla!
data.text:
A Falafel SHOULD NEVER BE SERVED IN A TORTILLA!

Undoubtedly the worst interpretation of a Falafel I have ever eaten.
I waited over 25 minutes for an overpriced disgusting burrito!  I will herein repeat:

A FALAFEL SHOULD NEVER BE SERVED IN A  T O R T I L L A!

This place is supposedly Medeterranian, where is the PITA?
